infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Thirteen needs access to your photo library to let you select a profile picture for your Bible reading groups.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Thirteen needs access to your camera to let you take a profile picture for your Bible reading groups.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Thirteen needs permission to save photos to your photo library when you want to save images shared in your Bible reading groups.

plugins.photosPermission: Thirteen needs access to your photo library to let you select a profile picture for your Bible reading groups.
plugins.cameraPermission: Thirteen needs access to your camera to let you take a profile picture for your Bible reading groups.
